page.title: 16VILLAGE CENTRE-GROBY
page.content: There are some new and some old shops in the centre. Some shops are over 100 years old. There is a bank called Barclays which is next to the newsagents. There is a small Co-op so you don't have to go far to get food. The{Post Office}has been opened for 60 years. It was built in 1876 and was originally two houses which were owned by the Victoria Stone Company. The two houses were knocked together to form the present building. They sort the mail at the post office and start work each day at 6.00am. They are open from Monday-Saturday and there are 11 collections a week. The{bread shop}was originally a school. A mallet and trowel were used to lay the foundations in 1873. It has been a bread shop for 4 years and they also sell cakes,sweets and health foods.
